name: radware-alteon
label: Radware Alteon
description: Radware Alteon is a robust and feature-rich application delivery controller that helps organizations optimize application performance, enhance security, and ensure high availability, making it a valuable component of modern IT infrastructure

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url

fields.title: Authentication Type
fields.name: authentication_type
fields.description: Select this authentication type as Basic or Token Based.

Basic Authentication.title: Username
Basic Authentication.name: username
Basic Authentication.tooltip: Specify the username for your account to access the Radware Alteon server to connect and perform the automated operations.
Basic Authentication.description: Specify the username for your account to access the Radware Alteon server to connect and perform the automated operations.

Basic Authentication.title: Password
Basic Authentication.name: password

Basic Authentication.description: Specify the password for your account to access the Radware Alteon server to connect and perform the automated operations.

Token Based.title: API Token
Token Based.name: api_token
Token Based.tooltip: Specify the Base64 encoded API Token to access the Radware Alteon Rest API server to connect and perform the automated operations.
Token Based.description: Specify the Base64 encoded API Token to access the Radware Alteon Rest API server to connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.
